name: "Supergirl" Season 1 Episode 4 Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What holiday is being celebrated during the episode?
questions.explanation:
Thanksgiving.

	Kara's mother, Eliza Danvers came to town to see her two daughters. Eliza was played by Helen Slater, who played the titular character in the live-action "Supergirl" movie in the 1980s.

questions.text: What does Eliza Danvers do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Bio-engineer.

	Eliza was a bio-engineer as revealed in flashbacks to when Kara and Alex were children. The DEO wanted her to work with them, instead her husband Jeremiah agreed to work with them and ended up dying on the job.

questions.text: The villain in the opening scenes was something that hadn't been shown on the series before. What was different about it?
questions.correct: It was the first female Supergirl had fought.
options: It was the first alien being Supergirl had fought.
It was the first human Supergirl had fought.
The "villain" was innocent and wrongfully attacked by Supergirl.
questions.explanation:
It was the first female Supergirl had fought.

	After three straight episodes of Supergirl battling male villains, the teaser opening had her fighting a female wanted by the DEO. It turned out to a prelude to things to come as the main villain in the episode was also a female.

questions.text: Who was Livewire before she became a villain?
questions.explanation:
Leslie Willis.

	Leslie Willis was a radio personality working on one of Cat's stations. Cat demoted her to a traffic reporter after Leslie attacked Supergirl on the air.

questions.text: How did Livewire get her powers?
questions.correct: Her helicopter was hit by lightning.
options: She was bitten by a werewolf.
Her DNA was altered in a chemical accident.
questions.explanation:
Her helicopter was hit by lightning.

	After being demoted to traffic reporter Leslie refused to land the helicopter during a lightning storm.   Supergirl flew up to save her and the pilot. Lightning struck while Supergirl was touching the chopper. Leslie was injured but some of Supergirl's powers manifested in Leslie in the form of her new electricity-based powers.

questions.text: Livewire attacked Cat. Where was she when Supergirl rescued her?
options: In a car, in the river.
Running down the street with Livewire giving chase.
questions.explanation:
In an elevator.

	Cat was attacked in her headquarters and eventually trapped in an elevator when Supergirl saved her. They figured out that Cat was the target and she agreed to work with the DEO and serve as bait for Livewire.

options: She was caught in a trap built by the DEO.
She overtaxed her powers and became human again.
Supergirl managed to overpower her during a fight.
questions.explanation:
Supergirl sprayed her with water.

	The DEO had built an electricity trap for Livewire, but it was damaged during a fight. Supergirl instead broke open an water main and sprayed Livewire with the water, proving that water and electricity don't mix.

questions.text: To whom did Kara apologize for fighting with her family in front of him/her?
questions.explanation:
Winn.

	Winn had been invited over to enjoyed Thanksgiving dinner with Kara, Alex and their mother. During the dinner Alex and their mother got in a fight and it turned into an all out shouting match that ended when Alex left the apartment and Kara was later called away to fight Livewire. Winn told her it was just nice being a part of a family.

questions.text: Whose father was revealed to be in prison?
questions.explanation:
Winn.

	It was revealed that Winn's father was in prison, but not why during the end of the episode. Viewers who were also fans of the comic knew that Winn, or Winslow Schott Jr. was the son of the villain known as the Toyman. He would appear later in the first season.

questions.text: What story did Kara use to explain why she grew up in a foster home?
questions.correct: Her parents were killed in a fire.
options: Her parents died in a car crash.
Her mother died in childbirth and she never knew her father.
questions.explanation:
Her parents were killed in a fire.

	Kara, having travelled from Krypton was placed with the Danvers family after she arrived on Earth. Since she was already a teenager, a cover story for where her real parents were had to be concocted. The family decided on explaining that she was a foster child due to the death of her parents in a fire.
